unnormalised: Bore, konnankoddenim halinch zal'lea kar kanun bodlanchi mahiti zanno assa mhunn vicharlem. Torek tor hi ek kahani asa, khorench. Fattli vorsak, 2023ant, mhaka ugddas asa mhozo chacha, Mr. Sharma, hankam Income Tax Dept. thaun ek notice aili. To Chandni Chowkant ek lhan kirana store cholaita. Dislelea pormannem, 01/07/2023 di fuddem lagu kel'lea navea GST niyamavixi thoddo ghondoll aslo.
normalised: Barobar, koni tori halinch tax kaydea bodlanchi vollokhechi vicharnni keli. Mhunnllear, ti ek khoreponnachi kotha asa. Fattlea vorrsa, don hozar ani tevisant, maka moje chacha, Mister Sharma, Income Tax D-e-p-t-akodden dhokho ailem mhunn zata. To Chandni Chowkant ek lhan kirana store cholaita. Poile July don hozar ani tevisant lag kel'lea navea G-S-T niyamank lagun thoddi gonfoll aslem dislem.

unnormalised: Tannem ek sthanik accountantacho adar gheun aplem return bhartalem, punn tannem sangloli income ani I-T vibhagan kel'leya andazanthi mell nasli. To bhov tantient aslo, tumi kalpna korum shaktai. Survatechi demand ₹25,000 ani viaz plus aslo. Tache sarkhea lhan veparak, te ek motem molachem zatam! Mhaka ugddas asa to mhuntalo, "Beta, yeh kya ho gaya?"
normalised: Tannem eka sthanik hissob-thevpeachea vorvim apli porot-patravlli bhortali, punn tannem ghoxit kel'lea utponnant ani I-T vibhagachea mulyankanam-modim mel na. To khub stressant aslem, tumi kalpna korum yeta. Poili magani rupiya ponchis hozar ani vyajachi asli. Tache sarkhea eka lhan veaparak lagun, ti ek mahatvachi rakkam asa! Mhaka tachi ullekhi asta, "Beta, yeh kya ho gaya?"

unnormalised: Bhagevantpanan, mhoji cousin, Priya, ji Delhi Universitynt law shiktam, tinnem tachi modot keli. Tinnem Income Tax Actachea Section 44ADachi ghanatai sangli, ji lhan businessank ek andazit income dakhoilleak porvangi dita. Uktem zalem, accountantan he section bore bhaxen vaprunk na. Priyan Chachak ek sudharlelom return bhartak modot keli, sogllem spoxhtt korun.
normalised: Bhagevontponni, moje bhaine Priya, ji Delhi Vidyapithant kaydo shiktat, tanne taka madat keli. Tinnem Income Tax Kaydeache kalom chalis ani char A-D-achea bareant sangillem, je lhan veaparak ek sambhavit utponn ghoxit korpak dita. Dislem ki, hissob-thevpean he kalom sarkheponnan lag kel'le naslem. Priya-n Chachak ek sudharit porot-patravlli bhortak madat keli, sogllem spoll korpak.

unnormalised: Kaim sumananchi bhitor, I-T vibhagan tacho case punha pasun andaj kelo, ani demand ₹5,000 meren kami kel'li. Bhov bore zalem! Hea pura anubhavanthi mhaka shikli ki kar kanunant thoddo bodol aslo tori to ek vhodd porinnam korum sakta, ani konnank tache vixen khorench mahiti asa tache laggi vichar korop sodanch borem. Tem mhaka aslem dakoilem ki puro sand ani lekho dovornen ani Income Tax Actache vegllea sections zoxe ki 80C, 80D, adi somzonen kite mhunn kitlem mhotvachem asa.
normalised: Thoddea sattea uprant, I-T vibhaganne tachi khes punar-mulyankan keli, ani magani rupiya panch hozar meren kam kel'li. Ek chodd bori parinam! Hea sogllea anubhavan maka shikoullem ki tax kaydeant aslelea khub lhan bodlankui ek vhodd probhav aasu yeta, ani ti sodanch ek bori vatta ki konn tori khoim legit apnnank zan karun dita teanchi sallagar gheumchi. Tannem hem-ui dakoilem ki kitlench mahatvachem asa sarkheponnan thevonn divop ani Income Tax Kaydeachea vegvegllea kalomanchi vollokh korop, zoxi assi C, assi D, iteadi.
